sense.name: 上午, morning, forenoon
sense.commentary: the part of the day from the time when the sun rises until the middle of the day.
sense.examples:
明天上午 tomorrow morning
我每周上午在书店工作三天。 I work three mornings a week at the bookstore.
星期天上午 Sunday morning

sense.name: 上午, 早上， forenoon
sense.commentary: the half of the day between 12 o'clock at night and 12 o'clock in the middle of the day.
sense.examples:
谋杀案发生在早上四点。 The murder took place at four in the morning.
火车明天上午两点开车 The train leaves at 2 tomorrow morning.
